comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: You will find an Atoyac town in Puebla and in Veracruz State where this picture most likely was taken. You'll find a picture of this bridges by Bruno Vivanco Ruiz in Panoramio Atoyac, Veracruz is found in maps.google.com.mx/maps?hl=es-419&q=atoyac+veracruz&a... In es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atoyac_(Veracruz)#Toponimia you'll find its coordinates
